Kobe taught us to be better.
You wake up every single day to get better today than you were yesterday.
Better dreamer, better waker, better stretcher.
Better walking the walk and talking the talk.
Better blocker, better sprinter, better loser, better winner.
Better friend, better fighter, better rider, better eater.
Better leader, better generation, better nation.
Better player, better shooter, better scorer.
Yup, better GOAT, better mentor, better minor.
Better believer, better first, better future, better hero.
Yeah, better father, better father, better father, better father, better father...
Better me, better you, better us.
